quotes.quote: It is better to be hated for what you are than to be loved for what you are not.
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.quote: We hate some persons because we do not know them; and we will not know them because we hate them.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: If you hate a person, you hate something in him that is part of yourself. What isn't part of ourselves doesn't disturb us.
quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

quotes.quote: Hate no one; hate their vices, not themselves.
quotes.author: J. G. C. Brainard

quotes.quote: Always remember others may hate you but those who hate you don't win unless you hate them. And then you destroy yourself.
quotes.author: Richard M. Nixon
